content: you can never have enough of these baskets use them for plants toiletries or to store craft items there are 3 variations all in stitches that are very suitable for beginning crocheters and each with a special effect the baskets are made with durable braided fine a soft braided cord made of 100% recycled cotton with a thickness of 3 mm the durable braided fine range has been expanded with 13 new colours ranging from soft pastels natural shades to bright colours will you choose one of the new colours for the baskets
